import './DeletePostForm.css' import CancelIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Cancel'; import {Component} from "react"; export class DeletePostForm extends Component { state = { postTitle: this.props.selectedPost.title, postTag: this.props.selectedPost.tag, postBody: this.props.selectedPost.body, postName: this.props.selectedPost.name, postPassword: this.props.selectedPost.password, } handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() this.props.deletePost() this.props.handleHideDeleteForm() } render() { const handleHideDeleteForm = this.props.handleHideDeleteForm return ( <>
